text: Hi everyone! I'm new to HubSpot development. can you tell me how can I design it

What <@UHC710Q1E> says. And if you want bloglisting pagination, you can use this: <https://dstwpdata.blogspot.com/2018/09/pagination-of-multiple-recent-post-blog.html?showComment=1610706270490#c650517412837401802> (worked on this today and it works!)
you would design this just like you would on any other webstie. If you are new to css/html and javascript then I would look for a tutorial on animating circles and graphs
possible this was a bug with the new rollout, have you tried again?
Here is the changelog regarding this update: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/design-manager-copy-to-different-account-functionality-updated>
